Key Match Events: The Pelicans were defeated by the Heat with a score of 119-108.
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans released a statement on the tragic terrorist attack in the French Quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans will play their next two games vs. Washington, beginning with a Friday home game at 7 p.m.
Others: The Pelicans were in Miami on Wednesday to open 2025 with a road game against the Heat.
